main_definition: Side refers to a position or direction, as well as the flank of an object or individual.

meanings_and_examples.definition: One of the two parts into which something is divided or the space on one side of an object or person
meanings_and_examples.example: I was standing next to her, on her right side.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The position or direction that something faces or moves towards
meanings_and_examples.example: He turned his car to the left side of the road.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An alliance or faction supporting a cause or person
meanings_and_examples.example: There were two sides in the argument: one for and one against.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A secondary opinion, perspective, or interpretation about an event or situation
meanings_and_examples.example: In any given debate, there are multiple sides to consider before making a decision.
